TopicTitle: B-Wing Replica, with a kerbal Twist: the K-Wing :)

Articles.Content:
The plane will take off and self rights, but it has a tendency to lean forward i could not fix, so begin pulling up soon after launch. Ditch the launch SRBs before they run out and fly around, be careful, it is a finicky plane, but spins can be recovered from.

Since landing the plane as a whole proved near impossible without destroying the aesthetics, just stage or abort to land the capsule.

The .craft file: http://www./view/zkyz1349a49sciz/K-Wing.craft
